article_title: Joplin City Council to act on South Main Street TIF
article_text:
Joplin, MO (64801)

Today

Scattered thunderstorms in the morning becoming more widespread in the afternoon. Heavy downpours are possible. A few storms may be severe. High 74F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected..

Tonight

Thunderstorms likely. A few storms may be severe. Low 64F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

article_metadata.author: Wally Kennedy wkennedy@joplinglobe.com

og.description: Ordinances establishing the South Main Street tax increment financing plan will go before the Joplin City Council during a meeting at 6 p.m. today in council chambers at City Hall.
